name: Scratch Clicker: Remastered
description:
That's right, after nearly 5 MONTHS, the production of SC: R, or Scratch Clicker: Remastered, has begun. I decided to create a short demo for the game so people can see what this project will come to be. 

Welcome to Scratch Clicker: Remastered, a definitive experience of the first Scratch Clicker game!

Press [SPACE] To use your boost!

Press [S] to open the Shop!

Press [W] to exit the shop!

Get as many points as you can in this early demo!

WARNING: This is an early demo if you haven't figured it out yet. Some features showcased may or may not be in the full game. The game may also be buggy or glitchy. This will be fixed in the future.
